name: Digital Universities Europe 2024 | Wroclaw, Poland | 23-25 September
content: Digital Universities Europe 2024 will bring together higher education, industry and policy leaders working to accelerate change in teaching and learning, assessment, administration and the student experience, as digital technologies reveal new possibilities. Institutions across Europe are facing a dramatically changing world as digital technologies and AI reveal new possibilities for harnessing universities’ data to create agile transformation in education and society. This event will provide the tools and knowledge to realise these opportunities, as well as a forum to determine the codes of ethical conduct required in a digital-first future. Hosted in partnership with WSB Merito University in Wroclaw, attendees can expect keynotes, interactive panel discussions, practical workshops, networking and much more. Agenda themes will cover: - Smart digital campus - Digital student experience - Innovation in teaching, learning and assessment Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/2555462-1?pid=4868 Time: 6:30 PM - 4:35 PM Venue Details: Uniwersytet WSB Merito Wroclaw, Fabryczna 29/31, Wroclaw, Wojewodztwo dolnosląskie, 53-609, Poland Price: Registration starts from: EUR 249.00
